com.igormaznitsa.prol.logic
Class IsolatedGoal

java.lang.Object
  com.igormaznitsa.prol.logic.Goal
      com.igormaznitsa.prol.logic.IsolatedGoal

public class IsolatedGoal
extends Goal

This class allows to make a wrapper for a Goal to avoid any changes into goal parameters.

Author:
Igor Maznitsa (igor.maznitsa@igormaznitsa.com)
